channel.title: Oh noes! Vista backup gone wrong!
channel.description:
Well, yesterday, I just made my friend really really angry. Unfortunately, he had vista, and I was downgrading it. I backed up his stuff, and I was sure that I told it to back up Documents and Settings, and after 30 minutes, it SAID it backed up around 6.4GB.
Well, after that, I re-formatted, and re-nstalled XP. I put the stuff from my portable hard drive onto his desktop. I go to my house, and he says that there is nothing there.. Now he says he needs a file from my hard drive. Unfortunately, I can't find this file! It was extremely important! Everything except for a couple files, including that important file, has been deleted... Victim of Vista?

item.title: Oh noes! Vista backup gone wrong!
item.dc:creator: @Rajae Rajae
item.description:
@Rajae wrote:

Well, I backed it all up onto my portable hard disk drive. It’s stupid to back it up on the same partition…

Read full topic
item.source: Oh noes! Vista backup gone wrong!

item.title: Oh noes! Vista backup gone wrong!
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

The problem isnt with vista, you could of just copied the files you wanted onto a normal rw cd or a usb flash disk.

Read full topic

lol i see why your downgrading but tbh i would not chance it
